extendedInfo.description: Following on from their popular social media page 'Clean Eating Recipes', comes the Clean Eating Recipesâ¢ app. Starting a clean, healthy lifestyle that the whole family will enjoy has never been so easy! This app eliminates textbook excuses "it's too hard with the kids", "I have to make separate meals for everyone", "it's too hard to make", "I was always hungry" etc User friendly features include Calendar Planner, Shopping List (which can be emailed), tips on building a clean pantry and Facebook interaction will help you bake, roast and serve your way through our app with ease and success. Easy step by step recipes with a nutritional breakdown for each! Start today and enjoy mouthwatering examples such as: - Spaghetti Bolognese - Gluten Free Chicken Schnitzel - Pancakes - Pizza - Desserts - Plus heaps more! We guarantee to turn your favourite comfort foods and family classics into clean, healthy alternatives that everyone will love! Never experience bland, boring food again. Unlock the secrets to a clean eating way of life! * Stocked with 74 Recipes! * More Recipes to be added in updates! * Lose inches off your waistline while enjoying meals the entire family will love! * Come to our facebook page to read testimonials from fellow Clean Eaters! * Say goodbye to tasteless boring food! * Support on our facebook page! http://www.facebook.com/CleanEatingRecipes Thank you for your support! The Clean Eating Recipes Team. TESTIMONIALS : ** T.L : thanks to clean eating and the knowledge I have gained i have reduced my cholesterol from 7.6 to 4.9 in 4 and a bit months! Lost 6 kilos, gained muscle and feel so much healthier! keep up the good work Clean Eaters.. :) ** S.L : Just tried the clean lasagne, absolutely awesome!!!! Best lasagne I've ever had!!! ** S.M : Loving this site and loving clean eating 4.3months in and 16.3 kg gone and my body has tone and muscles in places i have only dreamed of. Keep up the great work ** S.A : I've been clean eating since December 26. I've lost 16 pounds and I've NEVER had so much energy!

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: App is ok, but really disappointed that I can\'t open the new recipes that have been added even tho I downloaded the most recent update for it.
reviews.author: Natalie Atanasovska

reviews.title: Keeps crashing!
reviews.comment: Not the best app. Needs bug fixes. Keep a crashing, returning to home page and I cannot view the \'new\' recipes. Please fix!
reviews.author: Allison Cochrane

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: Im unable to open any of the recipes on my samsung galaxy 4. Total waste of money!!
reviews.author: natalie mullen

reviews.title: New recipes
reviews.comment: Why cant i open any of the new recipes!!??? Please fix this
reviews.author: Keira Grant

reviews.title: Wasted money
reviews.comment: Have never been able to open a recipe just constantly stops working - should of spent my money on a chocolate bar!
reviews.author: Gillian McDonald

reviews.title: Just so disappointed.
reviews.comment: According to CER, all the problems are due to \"peoples inability to use or understand their Android devices\". So basically,  we are all stupid.  Don\'t think I can wait for them to get it right.  Free clean recipes available all over fb and instagram.
reviews.author: mandajane33333

reviews.title: Freezes
reviews.comment: I just downloaded this app. And it let\'s me look at a few recipes then freezes and takes me back to my home screen this needs to be fixed then I may change my review!
reviews.author: DEANNA SHARMAN

reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.comment: After seeing the rating for this app and loads of criticisms I was quite apprehensive about buying this app. Works perfectly for me and so much easier than visiting their facebook page all the time. Awesome recipes too!!
reviews.author: Bec Collins

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Since the last update new recipes won\'t open & the application closes when I try to open other recipes.  Please fix these bugs.
reviews.author: Rebecca Tonkin

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: Have been following on FB and love the recipes but this app has some serious issues. Even after updating it closes for no reason and the layout is not user friendly.  Really disappointed, I wanted to rave about this one as have been waiting for the Android version.
reviews.author: Beth M

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Total waste of money.. nothing opens I want a refund !
reviews.author: Jasmin R

reviews.title: Worst app ever!!
reviews.comment: Constantly crashes never been able to view any recipe. Complete waste of money
reviews.author: Matt Hansen

reviews.title: Really has issues
reviews.comment: Only lets me look at a few recipes before it forcefully closes and i can not look at the new updated recipes even thought i have updated the app.... I heard all the hype about it on facebook and waited so long for the android to finally be released so now it\'s just frustrating and disappointing!!
reviews.author: Laura Besley

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Really dissapointed. Cant open any recipes on my galaxy s4. Total waste of money
reviews.author: Sheena Bain

reviews.title: Disgrace
reviews.comment: I paid for this site and it does not work. I cannot access any recipes off the app at all. Disgraceful money grabber.
reviews.author: Katie Richardson

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: Is this ever going to get fixed. I bought this month\'s ago and I still can\'t open a single recipe because it crashes!!!
reviews.author: sally cogle

reviews.title: Good idea but bad tech issues
reviews.comment: Stops working before I even got to open 1 recipe :( was excited for this app too!
reviews.author: Shai Urfan

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: Why do theses apps get released whilst still bugging??
reviews.author: Mel Lake

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Cannot download or open recipes. Ap does not work!
reviews.author: AlexTammy Reeves

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Still stopping on android phone please fix this problem persists.
reviews.author: Joanne James
